Title: Drink and be bleary, for tomorrow we die.

ItemTooltips.blink: Blink dagger is a very effective item for both kind of players,those who like playing more aggresive,and those who play him for utility. It provides you a good movement over the map.Still,this item shall not miss from your Mangix build.
ItemTooltips.bottle: It is a very viable option;still,I suggest it to build it only if you are playing in a hard-lane or in middle lane.
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: In my opinion,in early game,I think phase boots are the best. It helps you land your Thunder Claps easily as well as catching enemies from behind.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: If you decide to play as an initaitor,you have to build this item.
ItemTooltips.assault: This is one of the most effective items for Mangix.It offers you a great defense mechanism as well as you help yourself and your team with the benifts of the item.
ItemTooltips.bfury: Battle Fury is a very aggresive item for Mangix,The brewmaster. Still,it works quite well,but don`t build it only if necessary;only if you decide to play as a semi-carry OR if you are the only damage dealer in your team.
ItemTooltips.armlet: Armlet is a very viable choice for every kind of gameplay.It offers you a good amount of survivability,and it will help you resist more in a fight,as well as dealing some damage.
ItemTooltips.sange_and_yasha: Offers you some great stats,as well as you can catch  your enemies from behind;as well as giving you the option of being sure that you should resist in a fight.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: This is a good mobility item.As well for yourself,but for your team too.Should be considered as a main item if you decide to focus on utility.

AbilityTooltips.brewmaster_thunder_clap: In early game you may use this skill to farm,as well as picking up final blows.In late game you become the perfect counter for all carries(pointing Drunken Haze too).
AbilityTooltips.brewmaster_drunken_haze: This skill is way too perfect for countering carries.As well as you don`t need it that much in early game,it becomes crucial in late game.
AbilityTooltips.brewmaster_drunken_brawler: Drunken Brawler is why Brewmaster can be a carry for his team giving him 25% chance to do 200% damage. This is huge and makes up for most of your damage while not using your spirits.
AbilityTooltips.brewmaster_primal_split: As you know when you use this ability it summons the 3 different primal spirits. However this spell isn't used to just summon them there are still other uses for them. You use them to initiate fights.Skills: 1)Hurl Bolder,Spell Immunity; 2)Dispel Magic,Windwalk and Cyclone; 3)Permanent Immolation.
